text: The 1955 Argus Trophy was a motor race staged at the Albert Park Circuit in Victoria, Australia on 27 March 1955.Official Programme, Argus Moomba Motor Races, Albert Park Circuit, March 26th & 27th, 1955 The race, which was open to Formula Libre Racing Cars, was contested over 32 laps, a distance of 100 miles. It was organised by the Light Car Club of Australia and sponsored by The Argus, a Melbourne newspaper.Argus Mooma Motor Races, Australian Motor Sports, April 1955, pages 137 to 142 ==Results== {| class="wikitable" generated with :de:Wikipedia:Helferlein/VBA-Macro for EXCEL tableconversion V1.7<\hiddentext> |- style="font-weight:bold" | height="14" align="center" | Pos.
